QuestData.Title: Shu, the Spirit of Water
QuestData.Description: Shu, the spirit of water, is sulking in the deep pool to the north. Cross the rocks and then drop the sun pearl in the center of the pool. He will know what this means.
QuestData.LogDescription: Coax Shu, the spirit of water, into a game.

Objectives.Objective: Cross to the Pool of Reflection
